solution_line_template: If Sophie has twice as many dolls as Vera, then she has {sophie_multiplier} * {vera_dolls} dolls = <<{sophie_multiplier}*{vera_dolls}={sophie_dolls}>>{sophie_dolls} dolls
Aida has {aida_multiplier} * {sophie_dolls} dolls = <<{aida_multiplier}*{sophie_dolls}={aida_dolls}>>{aida_dolls} dolls, twice the number Sophie has.
In total, they have {aida_dolls} dolls + {sophie_dolls} dolls + {vera_dolls} dolls = <<{aida_dolls}+{sophie_dolls}+{vera_dolls}={total_dolls}>>{total_dolls} dolls
